<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;DWARFLINKER&#95;PARALLEL&#95;DWARFLINKER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;DWARFLINKER&#95;PARALLEL&#95;DWARFLINKER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/asmprinter-h">llvm/CodeGen/AsmPrinter.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarffile-h">llvm/DWARFLinker/DWARFFile.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h">llvm/DWARFLinker/DWARFLinkerBase.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfcontext-h">llvm/DebugInfo/DWARF/DWARFContext.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdie-h">llvm/DebugInfo/DWARF/DWARFDie.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h">llvm/MC/MCDwarf.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/targetparser/triple-h">llvm/TargetParser/Triple.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ------------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The core of the Dwarf linking logic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The generation of the dwarf information from the object files will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// driven by the selection of &#39;root DIEs&#39;, which are DIEs that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// describe variables or functions that resolves to the corresponding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// code section(and thus have entries in the Addresses map). All the debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// information that will be generated(the DIEs, but also the line</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tables, ranges, ...) is derived from that set of root DIEs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The root DIEs are identified because they contain relocations that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// points to code section(the low&#95;pc for a function, the location for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a variable). These relocations are gathered as a very first step</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// when we start processing a object file by AddressesMap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The overall linking process looks like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// parrallel&#95;for&#95;each(ObjectFile) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   for&#95;each (Compile Unit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     1 Load Clang modules.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   parrallel&#95;for&#95;each(Compile Unit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     1 Load input DWARF for Compile Unit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     2 Report warnings for Clang modules.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     3 Analyze live DIEs and type names(if ODR deduplication is requested).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     4 Clone DIEs(Generate output DIEs and resulting DWARF tables).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        The result is in an OutDebugInfoBytes, which is an ELF file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        containing DWARF tables corresponding to the current compile unit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     5 Cleanup Input and Output DIEs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Deallocate loaded Object file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (ODR deduplication is requested)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Generate an artificial compilation unit (&quot;Type Table&quot;: used to partially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   generate DIEs at the clone stage).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for&#95;each (ObjectFile) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   for&#95;each (Compile Unit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     1 Set offsets to Compile Units DWARF tables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     2 Sort offsets/attributes/patches to have a predictable result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     3 Patch size/offsets fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     4 Generate index tables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     5 Move DWARF tables of compile units into the resulting file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Every compile unit is processed separately, visited only once</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (except case inter-CU references exist), and used data is freed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// after the compile unit is processed. The resulting file is glued together</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from the generated debug tables which correspond to separate compile units.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Handling inter-CU references: inter-CU references are hard to process</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// using only one pass. f.e. if CU1 references CU100 and CU100 references</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CU1, we could not finish handling of CU1 until we finished CU100.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Thus we either need to load all CUs into the memory, either load CUs several</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// times. This implementation loads inter-connected CU into memory at the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pass and processes them at the second pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ODR deduplication: Artificial compilation unit will be constructed to keep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// type dies. All types are moved into that compilation unit. Type&#39;s references</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are patched so that they point to the corresponding types from artificial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// compilation unit. All partial type definitions would be merged into single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// type definition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker">dwarf&#95;linker</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel">parallel</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This structure keeps data of the concrete section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a5e12c3eb9ada6e834adf3bbabff0ff67">SectionDescriptorBase</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a5e12c3eb9ada6e834adf3bbabff0ff67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a5e12c3eb9ada6e834adf3bbabff0ff67">SectionDescriptorBase</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24">DebugSectionKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a19378e3183278a6ec1d6fe2f3ac9841c">SectionKind</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf/formparams">dwarf::FormParams</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a657f147ee0c2ca97c60d8e929acbda5f">Format</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000db">llvm::endianness</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a4c4a80dc8fb3cb9ff7e985798d599313">Endianess</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a19378e3183278a6ec1d6fe2f3ac9841c">SectionKind</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a19378e3183278a6ec1d6fe2f3ac9841c">SectionKind</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a657f147ee0c2ca97c60d8e929acbda5f">Format</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a657f147ee0c2ca97c60d8e929acbda5f">Format</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a4c4a80dc8fb3cb9ff7e985798d599313">Endianess</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#a4c4a80dc8fb3cb9ff7e985798d599313">Endianess</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#aeb3b369566ca86432a70c308165a4c26"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#aeb3b369566ca86432a70c308165a4c26">~SectionDescriptorBase</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns section content.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#aae4ec8e4e3cbeb0af1a4a17ebc1fa6c8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptorbase/#aae4ec8e4e3cbeb0af1a4a17ebc1fa6c8">getContents</a>() = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
